description: This joke plays on the double meaning of 'working on it'—both constructing a joke and actual construction work.
title: Work in Progress
n_1: Charlie, in construction gear, ponders over a building plan.
c1_1: I've got a humorous anecdote to share.
n_2: Alex looks on, curious, as Charlie scratches his head.
c1_2: It pertains to our construction work...
c1_3: Well, I'm still working on it.
n_4: They share a laugh amidst the construction site.
c2_4: Just like this structure we're building!
